combat.name: Combat
combat.description: Master the art of battle with various weapons and techniques

actions.name: Practice Swordplay
actions.unlockMessage: You begin training with the sword!
actions.flavorText: You practice your sword forms in the training yard, feeling more confident with each swing.

actions.name: Spar with Partner
actions.unlockMessage: You can now spar with training partners!
actions.flavorText: You and your training partner exchange blows, learning from each other's techniques.

actions.name: Hunt Bandits
actions.description: Track down and defeat bandit groups
actions.unlockMessage: You can now hunt dangerous bandits!
actions.flavorText: You track a group of bandits through the forest and engage them in combat.

actions.name: Slay Monsters
actions.unlockMessage: You can now face monstrous creatures!
actions.flavorText: You engage a fearsome monster in combat, testing your skills against its strength.

magic.name: Magic
magic.description: Learn the arcane arts and mystical spells

actions.name: Study Spellbook
actions.unlockMessage: You begin studying the arcane arts!
actions.flavorText: You pore over ancient spellbooks, memorizing incantations and magical theory.

actions.name: Cast Fireball
actions.unlockMessage: You can now cast fire spells!
actions.flavorText: A ball of flame erupts from your hands, illuminating the darkness.

actions.name: Heal Wounds
actions.unlockMessage: You can now heal with magic!
actions.flavorText: Warm healing energy flows from your hands, mending wounds and restoring vitality.

actions.name: Summon Familiar
actions.unlockMessage: You can now summon magical familiars!
actions.flavorText: A magical creature materializes before you, ready to serve as your companion.

crafting.name: Crafting
crafting.description: Create weapons, armor, and magical items

actions.name: Forge Iron Sword
actions.unlockMessage: You can now forge basic weapons!
actions.flavorText: You heat the iron in your forge and hammer it into a serviceable sword.

actions.name: Craft Leather Armor
actions.unlockMessage: You can now craft leather armor!
actions.flavorText: You carefully stitch together pieces of leather to create protective armor.

actions.name: Enchant Weapon
actions.unlockMessage: You can now enchant weapons!
actions.flavorText: You channel magical energy into the weapon, imbuing it with supernatural power.

actions.name: Create Masterwork
actions.description: Craft an exceptional item of legendary quality
actions.unlockMessage: You can now create masterwork items!
actions.flavorText: You pour your heart and soul into crafting, creating an item of exceptional quality.

woodcutting.name: Woodcutting
woodcutting.description: Cut down trees and gather wood

actions.name: Chop Oak
actions.unlockMessage: You can now chop oak trees!
actions.flavorText: You swing your axe at the oak tree and collect some logs.

actions.name: Chop Willow
actions.unlockMessage: You can now chop willow trees!
actions.flavorText: The willow tree's branches bend as you gather some logs.

actions.name: Chop Maple
actions.unlockMessage: You can now chop maple trees!
actions.flavorText: The maple tree's sturdy trunk yields some quality logs.

actions.name: Chop Yew
actions.unlockMessage: You can now chop yew trees!
actions.flavorText: The ancient yew tree slowly gives up some of its precious wood.

actions.name: Chop Magic
actions.unlockMessage: You can now chop magic trees!
actions.flavorText: The magic tree shimmers as your axe connects, releasing mystical logs.

actions.name: Fish Shrimp
actions.unlockMessage: You can now fish for shrimp!
actions.flavorText: You cast your net into the shallow water and catch some shrimp.

actions.name: Fish Sardine
actions.unlockMessage: You can now fish for sardines!
actions.flavorText: Your fishing rod bends slightly as you reel in a sardine.

actions.name: Fish Herring
actions.unlockMessage: You can now fish for herring!
actions.flavorText: The water ripples as you pull a herring from the depths.

actions.name: Fish Salmon
actions.unlockMessage: You can now fish for salmon!
actions.flavorText: After a brief struggle, you catch a salmon from the rushing river.

actions.name: Fish Lobster
actions.unlockMessage: You can now fish for lobster!
actions.flavorText: Your lobster pot successfully traps a large lobster.

actions.name: Fish Shark
actions.unlockMessage: You can now fish for shark!
actions.flavorText: With great effort, you manage to haul in a thrashing shark.

mining.name: Mining
mining.description: Mine various ores from the earth

actions.name: Mine Copper
actions.unlockMessage: You can now mine copper ore!
actions.flavorText: You swing your pickaxe at the rock and extract some copper ore.

actions.name: Mine Tin
actions.unlockMessage: You can now mine tin ore!
actions.flavorText: You swing your pickaxe at the rock and obtain some tin.

actions.name: Mine Iron
actions.unlockMessage: You can now mine iron ore!
actions.flavorText: The rock crumbles under your pickaxe, revealing iron ore.

actions.name: Mine Coal
actions.unlockMessage: You can now mine coal!
actions.flavorText: You chip away at the dark vein and collect some coal.

actions.name: Mine Gold
actions.unlockMessage: You can now mine gold ore!
actions.flavorText: A glint catches your eye as you mine a piece of gold ore.

actions.name: Mine Mithril
actions.unlockMessage: You can now mine mithril ore!
actions.flavorText: The blue-tinted mithril ore breaks free after several strong strikes.

actions.name: Mine Adamantite
actions.unlockMessage: You can now mine adamantite ore!
actions.flavorText: With great effort, your pickaxe manages to dislodge some adamantite ore.

actions.name: Mine Runite
actions.unlockMessage: You can now mine runite ore!
actions.flavorText: The rare runite ore gleams as you extract it from the ancient rock.
